step2.title: We Pick Up

step3.title: We Clean

q1.question: How much does the service cost?
q1.answer: The price depends on the area to be cleaned and the type of service. Contact us for an exact price and get a free consultation.

q2.question: How long does it take?
q2.answer: Cleaning time depends on the type of service and area size. On average it takes 2-4 hours. For large projects, the exact time is agreed in advance.

q3.question: Do you use eco-friendly products?
q3.answer: Yes, we only use eco-friendly and health-safe products. All our products meet international standards.

q4.question: Do you provide a guarantee?
q4.answer: Absolutely! We provide a 100% quality guarantee for all our services. If the result doesn't satisfy you, we'll re-clean for free.

q5.question: What payment methods are available?
q5.answer: You can pay by cash, bank card, or bank transfer. Payment is made after the cleaning work is completed.

q6.question: Is express service available?
q6.answer: Yes, we can provide service within 24 hours for urgent cases. An additional fee is charged for express service.
